description: This file defines the Response class for handling JSON-RPC responses within the WebSockets namespace. It declares methods for accessing response IDs, checking if the response contains a result or error, and retrieving respective JSON objects.

classes.name: Response
classes.description: Represents a JSON-RPC response message with methods to access its components, such as ID, result, and error content.

methods.name: getId
methods.description: Returns the unique identifier for the response.

methods.name: isResult
methods.description: Checks if the response contains a result.

methods.name: getResult
methods.description: Retrieves the result part of the response as a JsonObject.

methods.name: isError
methods.description: Checks if the response contains an error.

methods.name: getError
methods.description: Retrieves the error object from the response.
